description: This file defines the route endpoints for the backend API of a personal notes manager application. It sets up Express.js routes for health checks and CRUD operations on notes, integrating Swagger documentation annotations.

methods.name: router.get('/health')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the /health endpoint to perform a service health check.

methods.name: router.get('/api/notes')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a list of all notes.

methods.name: router.get('/api/notes/:id')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific note by its ID.

methods.name: router.post('/api/notes')
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new note.

methods.name: router.put('/api/notes/:id')
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing note by ID.

methods.name: router.delete('/api/notes/:id')
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a note by ID.
